member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: The WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE enumeration includes types of WebSocket buffers.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BINARY_MESSAGE_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: Buffer contains either the entire binary message or the last part of it.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BINARY_FRAGMENT_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: Buffer contains only part of a binary message.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_UTF8_MESSAGE_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: Buffer contains either the entire UTF-8 message or the last part of it.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_UTF8_FRAGMENT_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: Buffer contains only part of a UTF-8 message.

member.name: WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_BUFFER_TYPE.WINHTTP_WEB_SOCKET_CLOSE_BUFFER_TYPE
member.summary: The server sent a close frame.
